content: the name of this cal needs an explanation sarah is my daughter and we are very close we love the same things and laugh about the same things we think and feel alike we are like two peas in a pod sarah bought me the yarn for this blanket as a present ain t that sweet of her i dedicate this huge blanket to her much more information is to be found and read in the introduction of sarah information about the kits yes there are kits made by doris van der waals of haakhuis nl and you ll read the complete story behind sarah a new beginning of course the intro will learn you about the amount of yarn needed etc
